abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.text: Raticate can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Pickup
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Basic Pokémon (or Evolution card), a Trainer card, and an Energy card. Show them to your opponent and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 40 more damage.
